properties.name: Tony Vanden Heuvel
properties.description: Posted by Andrewm1009 Charles St. Watertown WI 53094, USAAndrew, this is where I live and if you ever need to contact me give me please feel free to call (001) 920-262-0202, e-mail me at vandto01@luther.edu or skype me at tony-vandenheuvel. I enjoyed working with you this summer (\'06) and I will be keeping my eye on ec and if I hear any interesting news that may affect the ESL industry in the US I\'ll be sure to pass it your way. Best regards to you and the entire ec staff. It has been a pleasure. Thank you.
